name: Vaporeon GX
author: PLANETA Otani

abilities.name: Hydrating Drops
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may heal 30 damage from your Active {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cure Shower GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from all of your {W} Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
